text: @PMOIndia The threat of covid19 has left the fitness industry ailing & barely able to stand with smaller gyms on the verge of shutting down, larger chains contemplating huge losses & unemployment becoming a very real prospect for many 1000 of trainers and support staff.. plz save gyms
